content.rendered:
Making the lives of busy New York parents easier.

As a dedicated childcare agency, our full attention and singular focus is on providing the bespoke childcare your family needs, from part-time and temporary nannies to full-time live-in support, with providers specialized in learning & development, newborn care, and beyond.

Get Started

Affiliated With

We don’t believe parents should have to choose between what’s easy and what's best.

We serve families with the highest standards for their children’s care – often seeking caregivers with higher education, specialty training, and second languages, but always seeking flexibility, adaptability, and commitment.

Why NbN?

The benefits of working with our agency:

  • Rigorous 3-part vetting process

  • Federal level background checks
  • Verbal employment references

  • Time saving searches

  • A dedicated placement coordinator throughout your search

  • Quality over quantity – bespoke matching

  • Tips and resource offerings throughout your search

  • Expert guidance before, during & after placement

  • Industry experts with current market knowledge

  • Guidance in defining work agreements to incentivize for longevity

  • Payroll assistance with our trusted partners

  • Replacement protection

and beyond...

Find Your Nanny
Find Your Family

Get the family support you need today.

We prioritize finding a match that best compliments your family’s values, dynamic, and unique care requirements. We facilitate strong partnerships with solid, rewarding, and lasting success for those who offer a genuine desire to support your family and household.

Find Your Nanny
Find Your Family

Don’t just take our word for it…

NbN is amazing and found exactly what we needed…
NbN is amazing and found exactly what we needed… They listen and offer helpful advice and a very personalized experience. Their backgrounds as a nannies and a moms makes their perspective invaluable.Thank you!Brittany M. | Parent
I felt encouraged and represented by the staff…
The communication was fantastic. Any time I had a question I felt comfortable emailing and they always responded quickly. They truly care about both the families and the Nannie’s.Jennifer C. | Nanny
I was impressed by their high quality profiles…
and very thorough and personalized choice for a bit of a "unicorn" search. Highly recommend!Caroline H. | Parent
It’s been an immense pleasure working with NbN…
They worked diligently to match me with the perfect family. I’m currently working with a lovely family and I couldn’t have done it without NbN’s patience, support and understanding.Vanessa V. | Nanny
Nannies by Noa was by far the best…
All of the candidates we saw from them were thoughtful, empathic, hard-working, fun, friendly people -- and we quickly found the person we wanted to hire. She has really changed our lives and our kids' lives. Totally worth it.Eli P. | Parent
I am SO happy in my new position…
I am so grateful to NbN for helping me find my new family. I appreciate the process that Nannies by Noa put me through. It went into great depth and was very professional.Kimmie W. | Nanny
They helped us find the perfect nanny…
We spent over an hour talking to me about my needs, my children, our family and they helped us find the perfect nanny! They showed attention to detail and care for both us and the nanny!Katayoun A. | Parent
NbN is the best agency I’ve worked with…
They really took the time to help me through the application process and make sure I would be connected with a great family. They go above and beyond. Love them!Mariety O. | Nanny

THE TEAM BEHIND NbN

There is nothing small about raising small humans.

We should know - we’re parents and nannies too!

One of the most important hires you’ll ever make requires a team with the experience, knowledge, and insight to source those who not only excel, but who truly belong in the childcare field.

Noa Mintz
Founder
Jo Barrow
CEO
Lucy Monge
Operations
Liza Monge
Admin & Communications
Rosie Moreno
Recruiting & Placement Lead

Featured Press

We fuse raw entrepreneurial talent, youthful energy and decades of professional experience to create a winning team at NbN. We are honored to have our story shared in some of today’s most prestigious news and media publications.

As Seen In

Fortune

“18 Under 18: Meet the Young Innovators who are Changing the World”…

View Full Feature

The New York Times

Care workers are organizing for better work conditions and to keep pandemic gains going…

View Full Feature

Acorns + CNBC

How Noa Mintz built a successful business while still in high school…

View Full Feature

CNN Money

On the outside, Noa Mintz is a typical teen—braces and all. But while her peers are chatting about boys…

View Full Feature

Time

Growing up, 15-year-old Noa Mintz was always nonplussed by the cadre of babysitters her parents…

View Full Feature

New York Post

During one of her weekly sessions at SoulCycle last year, Noa Mintz, the founder of Nannies by Noa, had an epiphany…

View Full Feature
View All Past Press

Your children are your whole world!

A great nanny acts as an extension of you in your absence, supporting your values and preferences, and aligning with your parenting style and philosophies to provide a secure, safe, and united home for your family.

Find Your Nanny
Find Your Family
